message.body: Have you ever had to do masonry/ brick repair? I need some advice
Turns out the liner is galvanized not stainless. Should I pay chimny dudes to replace the liner with stainless?

I would look for stainless on craigslist. I don't think you need double walled since it is surrounded by masonry. If it is a straight run, you could probably do it yourself depending on how it penetrates your roof
Also I have an otterbox for iPhone 4 or 4s if you want it
